sndlib.core.validation
Interface ProblemValidator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProblemValidators
public interface ProblemValidator

This interface provides the facility to validate a given Problem against any feasibility condition.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
ProblemValidators

Method Summary
 void validate(Problem problem, com.atesio.utils.message.Messages errors)
          Validates the given problem against a specific feasibility condition.
 

Method Detail

validate

void validate(Problem problem,
              com.atesio.utils.message.Messages errors)
Validates the given problem against a specific feasibility condition.

The occuring validation errors will be appended to the specified messages container.

Parameters:
problem - the problem to validate
errors - the message container into those the errors are put
